reasoning: Primary open angle glaucoma prevalence ~4.2% globally from population-based surveys (2000-2010 data). Incidence of new diagnoses ~2.5 per 100k person-years. Reporting both metrics as both are epidemiologically relevant.
source: Quigley HA & Broman AT. (2006). The number of people with glaucoma worldwide in 2010 and 2020. Br J Ophthalmol. 90(3):262-267
